product_overview: This project is a modern, animated portfolio website that showcases projects with advanced parallax and scroll-triggered animations to create an engaging user experience.
core_goals: Create smooth and visually appealing parallax effects for various content sections.
Implement performant horizontal scrolling project showcases with engaging GSAP animations.
Provide interactive components such as a contact form and animated hero section to enhance user engagement.
Ensure consistent styling and responsive design through Tailwind CSS and reusable components.
Optimize scrolling performance to avoid lag or slowdowns, especially towards the end of scrolling areas.
key_features: Scroll-based ParallaxSection component with smooth scaling animations for child elements.
Mouse-triggered ParallaxImage component with layered foreground and background images.
Horizontal scrolling ProductGrid showcasing projects with GSAP ScrollTrigger animations.
Hero section with animated backgrounds and content layout.
Typing animation TextType component for dynamic text effects.
Skateboard-themed ProjectCard for visually distinct project presentation.
Lenis-based smooth scrolling implementation to enhance scrolling experience.
Reusable Heading and ButtonLink components for consistent UI elements.
Custom CSS and Tailwind CSS based styling with CSS animations.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage greeted by an animated Hero section.
Scrolling triggers ParallaxSection and ParallaxImage animations creating depth and motion effects.
User navigates through horizontally scrollable ProjectGrid showcasing various projects with animated cards.
User can interact with typing animations integrated in text sections for dynamic content presentation.
Users may scroll smoothly powered by Lenis-based smooth scrolling to reduce lag and provide fluid movement.
ContactForm accessible for users to send messages or inquiries.
Footer section anchors the end of the page with consistent branding and navigation links.
validation_criteria: Parallax scrolling effects are smooth without lag or jitter throughout the scroll range.
Horizontal project showcase scrolls fluidly with GSAP animations triggering at correct scroll positions.
Mouse position triggers responsive parallax image movements accurately.
Typing animations are timed correctly and visually appealing.
ContactForm submits data properly and handles validations.
All components render correctly across supported devices and screen sizes.
CSS and animation performance optimized to prevent slowdown, especially at scroll end.
User interface consistency maintained using reusable components and Tailwind CSS styling.
